description: Describes the specified Amazon Web Services Systems Manager document (SSM document).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: Sha1
nested_items.description: The SHA1 hash of the document, which you can use for verification.

nested_items.name: Hash
nested_items.description: The Sha256 or Sha1 hash created by the system when the document was created.

nested_items.name: HashType
nested_items.description: The hash type of the document. Valid values include Sha256 or Sha1.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the SSM document. This value can differ for each version of the document. If you want to update this value, see  UpdateDocument.

nested_items.name: VersionName
nested_items.description: The version of the artifact associated with the document.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services user that created the document.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the document was created.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: StatusInformation
nested_items.description: A message returned by Amazon Web Services Systems Manager that explains the Status value. For example, a Failed status might be explained by the StatusInformation message, 'The specified S3 bucket doesn't exist. Verify that the URL of the S3 bucket is correct.'

nested_items.name: DocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The document version.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the document.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: A description of the parameters for a document.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of parameter. The type can be either String or StringList.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of what the parameter does, how to use it, the default value, and whether or not the parameter is optional.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: If specified, the default values for the parameters. Parameters without a default value are required. Parameters with a default value are optional.

nested_items.name: PlatformTypes
nested_items.description: The list of operating system (OS) platforms compatible with this SSM document.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DocumentType
nested_items.description: The type of document.

nested_items.name: SchemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version.

nested_items.name: LatestVersion
nested_items.description: The latest version of the document.

nested_items.name: DefaultVersion
nested_items.description: The default version.

nested_items.name: DocumentFormat
nested_items.description: The document format, either JSON or YAML.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: The target type which defines the kinds of resources the document can run on. For example, /AWS::EC2::Instance. For a list of valid resource types, see Amazon Web Services resource and property types reference in the CloudFormation User Guide.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags, or metadata, that have been applied to the document.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: AttachmentsInformation
nested_items.description: Details about the document attachments, including names, locations, sizes, and so on.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the attachment.

nested_items.name: Requires
nested_items.description: A list of SSM documents required by a document. For example, an ApplicationConfiguration document requires an ApplicationConfigurationSchema document.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the required SSM document. The name can be an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The document version required by the current document.

nested_items.name: RequireType
nested_items.description: The document type of the required SSM document.

nested_items.name: VersionName
nested_items.description: An optional field specifying the version of the artifact associated with the document. For example, 12.6. This value is unique across all versions of a document, and can't be changed.

nested_items.name: Author
nested_items.description: The user in your organization who created the document.

nested_items.name: ReviewInformation
nested_items.description: Details about the review of a document.

nested_items.name: ReviewedTime
nested_items.description: The time that the reviewer took action on the document review request.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the document review request.

nested_items.name: Reviewer
nested_items.description: The reviewer assigned to take action on the document review request.

nested_items.name: ApprovedVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the document currently approved for use in the organization.

nested_items.name: PendingReviewVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the document that is currently under review.

nested_items.name: ReviewStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the review.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The classification of a document to help you identify and categorize its use.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CategoryEnum
nested_items.description: The value that identifies a document's category.
(string) ---
